Package com.droidcare.control

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AlarmReceiver.OnFinishListener
    Interface used to allow the SimpleHttpPost to run some code when it has finished executing.
    AppointmentManager.OnFinishListener
    Interface used to allow the SimpleHttpPost to run some code when it has finished executing.
    ConsultantAppointmentManager.OnFinishListener
    Interface used to allow the SimpleHttpPost to run some code when it has finished executing.
    LoginManager.OnFinishTaskListener
    Interface used to allow the SimpleHttpPost to run some code when it has finished executing.
    PatientAppointmentManager.OnFinishListener
    Interface used to allow the SimpleHttpPost to run some code when it has finished executing.
    RegisterManager.OnFinishTaskListener
    Interface used to allow the SimpleHttpPost to run some code when it has finished executing.
    UserManager.OnFinishListener
    Interface used to allow the SimpleHttpPost to run some code when it has finished executing.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlarmReceiver
    Receives "ALARM" broadcasts for notification purpose (the type of notification depends on the user's choice).
    AlarmSetter
    Sets the notification "ALARM" depending on the date of each appointment.
    AppointmentListAdapter
    This adapter class is responsible for retrieving data from an ArrayList object and transforming the data into items inside the ListFragment
    AppointmentManager
    Fetches, stores and manages a list of Appointment objects.
    AppSessionManager
    Handles and manages the user's current app session.
    ConsultantAppointmentManager
    A subclass of AppointmentManager.
    Global
    Contains global constants used in the app.
    HomeTabsPagerAdapter
    This class is responsible for handling switching between tabs and determines what to be displayed inside the selected tabs
    ImageManager
    Encodes an image Bitmap object into a Base64 encoded String and decodes a Base64 encoded String into an image Bitmap object.
    LoginManager
    This singleton class handles all user login and logout request.
    PatientAppointmentManager
    Responsible for creating, modifying, and cancelling the patient's Appointment objects.
    RegisterManager
    Contains the logic for registering a new patient user.
    SimpleHttpPost
    Generalized class for sending HTTP POST Request to any URLs.
    UserManager
    Manages the current user of the application.
